g.text: 3043(N) vs 3059(H) “Ryanair Strike” Thread ARyanair to cancel 24 flights on Friday due to strike. Ryanair is to announce the cancellation of 24 flights, affecting thousands of passengers, after a pilot union refused to postpone its planned strike action for Friday.1.More misery for passengers with Ryanair set to cancel another 24 flights. RYANAIR is to announce the cancellation of 24 flights, affecting thousands of passengers, after a pilot union refused to postpone its planned strike action for Friday.2.Ryanair publishes staff payslipsamid pilot strikes. Budget airline Ryanair has taken the bold step of publishing the pay and benefits afforded to its pilots amid the third 24-hour strike from Irish workers in an ongoing dispute over working conditions and promotions.2.1. Ryanair publishes striking workers' payslips.The Irish budget airline hits back at Irish pilots staging a third 24-hour strike over working conditions.Thread B1.What to do if an airline cancels your flight at home or abroad this summer. 10% of Ryanair flights were called off this week due to strike action. With the summer holidays approaching, here's what to do if your airline lets you down.2.Ryanair to reject compensation payments for passengers affected by strike. The regulator says that passengers should be due cash compensation.3.Ryanair to cancel 24 flights on Friday due to strike.Ryanair is to announce the cancellation of 24 flights today, affecting thousands of passengers, after a pilot union refused to postpone its planned strike action for Friday.4.More misery for passengers with Ryanair set to cancel another 24 flights. RYANAIR is to announce the cancellation of 24 flights, affecting thousands of passengers, after a pilot union refused to postpone its planned strike action for Friday.
